title: Linda Mtoba shares adorable snap of her baby girl: 'I'm so happy and so in love'
text:
Linda Mtoba shares adorable snap of her baby girl: 'I'm so happy and so in love' share this

Johannesburg – Linda Mtoba is happier than ever after welcoming her baby girl.

The actress announced in early October that she had given birth by posting a black and white image of her little one's hand on Instagram.

Now, just weeks later, the star is gushing over her baby.

Linda shared a photo of her little girl and her partner, writing: "My blessings. I look at them and tears just flood out my eyes because I'm so happy & so in love. My heart gets so full that it overflows and needs an exist point so tears fall cause my heart contain it all [sic]."

She then went on to thank everyone for their kindness and love.

TAKE A LOOK AT THE PICTURE HERE:
description: Linda Mtoba is happier than ever after welcoming her baby girl.
